A C D E G I K L O S W 

A

addCommand(command) - Method in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.KommandantConfigurable
Overrided addCommand method which adds a command to the registry and additionally checks for enableConfigReadWrite value in attempt to load command properties from JSON if true. If the JSON does not exist, it will be created with the command's default properties.

C

com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant - package com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant
 
com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.configurable - package com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.configurable
 
CommandConfig - Class in com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.configurable
An object class containing default constants and methods for getting, loading, and saving command configs.
CONFIG_FOLDER - Static variable in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.configurable.CommandConfig
The default folder location where all command configuration files will be found. Defaults to "kommandant"

D

disableCommand(command) - Method in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.KommandantConfigurable
Disables a command to prevent execution.

E

enableCommand(command) - Method in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.KommandantConfigurable
Enables a command for execution.

G

getConfigs(command, currentPath, configMap) - Static method in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.configurable.CommandConfig
Default method to get configuration files for a command and all of its subcommands.
getEnableConfigReadWrite() - Method in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.KommandantConfigurable
Whether commands should have their properties loaded from and written to JSON.

I

INSTANCE - Static variable in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.configurable.CommandConfig
An object class containing default constants and methods for getting, loading, and saving command configs.

K

KommandantConfigurable - Class in com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant
An extension of the default Kommandant aggregation which allows one to completely disable or enable a registered command, as well as including a boolean setting to enable or disable command properties being written to and read from JSON files.
KommandantConfigurable(enableConfigReadWrite, cmdBank, cmdExecutor, cmdParser) - Constructor for class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.KommandantConfigurable
Default constructor which uses default implementations of the registry, parser, and executor.
KommandantConfigurable() - Constructor for class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.KommandantConfigurable
Default constructor which uses default implementations of the registry, parser, and executor.

L

loadConfig(command) - Method in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.KommandantConfigurable
Loads a command's JSON configuration for customized command properties.
loadConfigs(command, currentPath, configMap) - Static method in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.configurable.CommandConfig
Default method to load configuration files for a command and all of its subcommands.

O

OBJECT_MAPPER - Static variable in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.configurable.CommandConfig
Default Jackson object mapper instance for serializing and deserializing JSON

S

saveConfig(command) - Method in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.KommandantConfigurable
Saves the command's current properties to JSON.
setEnableConfigReadWrite(p) - Method in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.KommandantConfigurable
Whether commands should have their properties loaded from and written to JSON.

W

writeConfigs(command, currentPath) - Static method in class com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.configurable.CommandConfig
Default method to write configuration file sfor a command and all of its subcommands.
